body.para: The Auto Grease Maintenance screen below displays greasing interval time and the current run time for each axis or spindle.

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:14px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:10px; margin-left:48px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:avoid; border:none; tabstops:57px left ;

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;

text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;
li.text: soft key on the Navigation Menu screen.

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;

text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:14px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:48px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Auto Grease Maintenance screen is displayed.

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:14px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:48px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

table.style: border-width:0px; border-spacing:0px; border-collapse:collapse; cell-border-width:1px; border-color:#000000; border-style:solid;

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:3px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:3px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: This area displays the current status of lube type auto grease components I/Os.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:3px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:3px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:3px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Operator can set the initial fill count during first setup of a new machine. Upon an initial fill process is finished once, the count is reduced by 1. Initial Fill mode can be enabled until the count reaches 0.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:3px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:3px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:3px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: This area displays the total auto grease time for which auto greasing has been carried out as well as auto grease maximum count set by parameter MC07006 (ATGRMXCT). If the total time reached the maximum count, an alarm (AL1586) or warning (WR2027), Auto Grease Count Over will occur.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:3px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:3px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:-25px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:3px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:28px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: The interval between two consecutive auto greasing processes. Time display is based on whether it is in Normal mode or Initial Fill mode. In Normal mode, pause time can be set by parameter MC07025 (AGPTM1) and in Initial Fill mode, pause time can be set by parameter MC07026 (AGPTM2).

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-25px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:25px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:-25px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:3px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:28px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Indicates how much time remaining for the occurrence of next auto greasing process.
